full_name: Interlude I: Friends in Low Places

steps.text: If Hibbs has your back or Arkham stands united:

Rivertown is quiet. With most of the remaining citizens of Arkham holed up, the streets have only flickering street lamps to keep you company. Strangely, the creatures have also vanished, along with most of the choking fogs.
An hour into your exploration in the Rivertown neighborhood, you're startled by a hand on your shoulder. You turn to strike, but find Hibbs standing with a grin.
"Easy, friend! Heard you were somewhere around here, figured I'd come and lend a hand for a while. It's the least I could do given all the help you did for me. Just for a while, though. Afterwards, well..."

Hibbs pauses for a moment, staring at the ground. He squares his shoulders and looks you in the eyes. "Actually, no. You got the savvy to have made it past the suits, and you care about this city. You got a good head on your shoulders. City doesn't need me to keep the Agency's secrets. City'd be better off if I stick around and help you put a stop to this. Besides, it's not like you aren't already in the know. From now on, I'm with you."
Any one investigator may choose to add Hibbs (Here to Help) to their deck for the remainder of the campaign. This card does not count against that investigator's deck size.
Add one [cultist] to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

Hibbs pauses for a moment, staring at the ground. He slumps his shoulders and speaks. "After we find you a lead, I head back. Got a lot of folks safe at the roadhouse, but you never know what could go wrong. There has to be someone there to make sure everyone stays put. So I'll help you search and then return. That'll leave us square."
Add one [skull] to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.

Rivertown is quiet. With most of the remaining citizens of Arkham holed up, the streets have only flickering street lamps to keep you company. Strangely, the creatures have also vanished, along with most of the choking fogs. An hour into your exploration in the Rivertown neighborhood, you round a corner and walk directly into a cloud of the glowing haze. Your eyes lose focus, and for a moment, you see through many eyes at once. You see one self weaving robes of flesh and reciting twisted chants. Another howls, and slowly drags itself arm over arm from a deep tunnel into dark woods. Another stares over a corpse and curses fate. The Plaguebearer stares through darkness at a small blue sphere, dangling below a colossal red palm that drips green ichor from a stigmata.
My return draws near
The miasma recedes, and your self returns.

effects.text: you have received a twisted gift.

steps.text: <center><strike><red>I grant you this because you cannot stop me</red></strike></center>
Add one [tablet] to the chaos bag for the remainder of the campaign.
<center><strike><red>How can you expect to contain me when you cannot even contain your curiosity</red></strike></center>
Each investigator who reads this begins the next scenario with a horror (in addition to any mental trauma) and an additional card in hand.
